name: Gold Bash
description:
A simple game made during the Global Game Jam Panama 2020.

You are in charge of keeping the moles from causing the mine to collapse. With your trusty hammer, smack the moles before they break the pillars holding the mine up, and repair any broken pillars. If all pillars are broken, the game ends.

Try to hold out as long as possible and get the highest score possible. Be careful though, the longer you hold out, the more and the quicker the moles become.
